text: Oh that sounds fantastic about the volunteering you'll be doing. Will be an eye-opening experience I'm sure and lots to add to your CV! How did you find the opportunity?
You can ask all the grannies for life tips :stuck_out_tongue_winking_eye:

OK so how about we focus on #2 from our list first? i.e. to start thinking about work experience and building a CV for you to apply... A good place to start is probably to see if there are any companies or industries that interest you? We can then see if they offer work experience on their website in their tech/security team...and if not, it might be worth still applying as you can learn how tech teams work (even if its not specifically in a tech company i.e. it could be Primark's tech team for example!])
It's also okay if no companies come to mind. When I was doing A-Levels I had no idea what companies were out there (I still dont hehe)
Of course - I work at Prospela and we are building a new version of this chat you are using now :joy:
